BRW ICD9X10
ICD9 <=> ICD10 Translator

This app is your tool to easily translate between ICD9 and ICD10 codes.

Translation can go in either direction:
ICD9 => ICD10
ICD10 => ICD9

To translate simply tap on the desired code.

Search Tips:
The default search will search for descriptions that contains the word or phrase you typed in.
Examples:
Enter knee for a list of ICD codes that contains the word "knee".
Enter open wound for a list of ICD codes that contains the phrase "open wound".

More advanced searching can be performed with the use of the "&" and "|" symbols.
Examples:
Enter knee & ankle for a list of ICD codes that contains the word "knee" and the word "ankle".
Enter knee | ankle for a list of ICD codes that contains one or both of the words "knee" and "ankle".

To search for specific ICD codes, use the "#" symbol. This will search for ICD code that begin the with value you entered.
Example:
Enter #015 for a list of ICD codes begin with "015".

Adding Favorites:
When viewing search results, favorites can be stored in one of two ways:
- Long click a single item
- Use the menu to store all items related to your search

Removing Favorites:
When viewing favorites, favorites can be removed in one of two ways:
- Long click a single item
- Use the menu to remove all items related to your search
